resources.string: To add a stock to portfolio, press Menu > Add.

The information display in this application are retrieve from third party sources.

Created by siuying (twitter.com/siuying)

Information from HKEX (http://www.hkex.com.hk) and Money 18 (http://money18.on.cc). 

Agile Stock use following opensource libraries:
 * HtmlCleaner
 * XStream
 * Apache Commons IO
 * Apache Commons Lang
Please enter a Hong Kong Stock Quote (e.g. 00001)
An error occurred while downloading file. Please make sure you have internet connection and try again.
Cannot find stock with input quote. Please make sure you have enter correct number.
Cannot parse stock data from source!
No working network connect is detected. Make sure the network is active and try again.
